title: Saguaro National Park: DVD: A Home in the Desert
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Curriculum Materials     DVD: A Home in the Desert                Saguaro National Park: A Home in the Desert DVD       This 15-Minute video explores the Rincon Mountain (East) District of Saguaro National Park. From the Sonoran Desert floor to lush grasslands to the tree covered mountaintops, the park provides homes for many species of plants and animals. This DVD is available for loan by contacting Melanie Florez at (520) 733-5151 or e-mail at e-mail us.       NPS photo        NPS photo
